description.p: Tauon Music Box is a modern, comfortable and streamlined music player for the playback of your music collection.

Packed with features while maintaining simplicity. Use drag and drop for easy file importing and playlist management. Groups albums by folder and allows you to manage your music with built-in functions such as file and folder renaming, cover art downloading and file deleting.

ul.li: Playback local audio files including MP3, FLAC and OGG
Import Spotify tracks and control Spotify playback
Add network tracks from Airsonic and koel servers
Lookup artists on Rate Your Music and Bandcamp
Scrobble and love tracks to last.fm
Support for Listenbrainz and launching the Musicbrainz Picard tag editor
Import downloaded music archives in one click
Large album art and gallery layouts
Transcode and sync to device functionality
Support for lyrics including synced lrc files and guitar chords
